message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $10,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product to me is considerably higher.  Could you consider $9,000?
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $7,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $7,500?
